item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:159 Chances: Shares of social network Snapchat jumped 7.5% in the afternoon session after stocks rebounded following Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s testimony Nasdaq rose more than 1.5%, while the S&P 500 gained 0.89% Snap is growing its user base Risks: Snap’s shares plummeted in February 2024 Profits remain elusive for Snap Score:159 chances characters count - risks characters count = 159
